publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3869 Alex Neil on behalf of the Enterprise and Lifelong Learning Committee: Enterprise and Lifelong Learning Committee, Report on the Future of Tourism in Scotland-That the Parliament notes the 1st Report 2003 of the Enterprise and Lifelong Learning Committee, Report on the Future of Tourism in Scotland (SP Paper 740), and commends the report to all stakeholders in the tourism sector.

S1M-3869 Alex Neil on behalf of the Enterprise and Lifelong Learning Committee: Enterprise and Lifelong Learning Committee, Report on the Future of Tourism in Scotlandâ€”That the Parliament notes the 1st Report 2003 of the Enterprise and Lifelong Learning Committee, Report on the Future of Tourism in Scotland (SP Paper 740), and commends the report to all stakeholders in the tourism sector.
S1M-3869 Enterprise and Lifelong Learning Committee, Report on the Future of Tourism in Scotland (lodged on 6 February 2003) Miss Annabel Goldie*
